website_summaries.verdict: If you love Birkenstocks, these sandals have the features that attracted you to the brand and more – excellent workmanship, comfortable wear, and an updated, strappy style.
pros: These Granadas earn high marks for the soft foot beds, which have an internal layer of foam beneath the cork covering
Owners also rave about the arch support
cons: There is a fairly short break-in period during which time the straps may rub in areas
Choosing the best size can be difficult, as they tend to run large

customer_reviews.title: Stains your feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Birks for YEARS and never have I experienced the heavy staining on my feet. I did research and it said water proofing might help and as you can see, it didn't do any good. Mind you, I did not get these wet. These are stains just from wearing these for a few hours. Nd scrubbing the stain off requires dawn and a scrub brush! I'm very upset to pay this money and not be as ble to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Beck

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned these Birkenstock’s for almost 2 years now and they will not break in to the point where they don’t run off skin. The top straps are very rigid with metal staple like structures on the underside. Very poor design for Birkenstock. I expect more out of $125 shoe. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt the best shoes I have ever purchased! They were incredibly comfortable even right out of the box! I have high arches and regular sandals kill my feet, but these offer more than enough support and durability for every day activities. This is my first ever pair of Birks but I will definitely be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sooo disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I could give these no stars I would! I’m absolutely pissed that I paid $135 for FAKE BIRKENSTOCKS, there are so many flaws but I’ll include a few pics, absolutely ridiculous that amazon would let their sellers deceive us!!! First pic will be the glue left on the inside, 2nd and 3rd show some sort of melting on the sole. Real Birkenstock have the word “birk” on the bottom in small letters where these are in bigger letters. Sooo disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with Birkenstocks! This is my second pair and by far my favorite. I purchased silver in the size 38. My U.S. shoe size is a 7-7.5. In my other pair I got the size 37 because reviews I read said that they run a little big. My other pair fits just right but this purchase feels more comfortable and I prefer this size. I wear these pretty much every other day because they are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Mom Was Right
customer_reviews.text: As a kid I used to give my mom so much crap for wearing Birkenstocks despite her testimony that they were pure heaven on her feet. I believe she still has the same pair that she bought 20 years ago. I’ve always had flat feet, and as an adult I developed heal spurs. Remembering my mom swearing by them and knowing that she’d had hers for so long, I decided to finally get my first pair of Birkenstocks. They were so comfortable and helped with preventing flat foot & spur associated pain so much that I had to text my mom and tell her that she was right!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Narrower and firmer than other regular width soft footbed Birks
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft footbed Birkenstocks. This is my third pair and it's the first pair to not be instantly comfortable. It has a traditional break in period like regular Birkenstocks. However now that I have had them for a while, they are working much better for me. They do still give me blisters on occasion. For a regular size they seem a bit narrow. I love this style. So much cuter than the Arizona. Overtime I hope to love them. Right now I just kind of like them and I purchased them 6 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock may not be the cutest shoes but they’re the most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Birkenstock may not be the cutest shoes but these are passable for cute considering it’s Birkenstock. I’ve had a lot of foot surgeries and these are the only shoes that feel good on my feet. For those who have never tried them you must break them in a little at a time the foot bed will eventually become kind of shiny from the oils in your own feet. That’s when you have a true form of your foot like a custom orthotic. I’ve tried other shoes but I always come back to these I think I own 16 or 17 pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy T.

customer_reviews.title: Light Finish, Straps Bothered, Footbed Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these because the cut of the leather strap uncomfortably dug into my pinky and next little toe. Not for me and my foot. Or, maybe I should have tried breaking them in. I returned them and ordered a pair of Gizeh which I like a lot and are much more comfortable for me. Soft footbed was very comfortable but I'm not sure it's necessary. Regular cork bed is also comfortable. I ordered these Granada's in black and found that they were a very dull black, a little grayish actually due to the finish. I thought they would look darker or have a more oiled finish but they did not. Didn't really look like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Karle

customer_reviews.title: Had a pair, lost them, very happy to have replaced them, as I live in them all summer
customer_reviews.text: These have been my summer sandals for years, until I was stupid enough to read a book while wearing them and with my puppy in the room. Absorbed in book, didn't notice feet, looked down to find she'd eaten through all the straps! I was out of the US, and the non-leather version was all I could get to replace them. NOT THE SAME. The minute I hit the States, I ordered these and with summer here, very glad I am. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: AnnM

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock Women's Granada Slide, Tobacco oiled-leather "Soft Bed" thicker sole.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Women's Granada Slide Sandal with oiled-leather and the thicker cork sole. They are so comfortable! I have purchased the Birkenstock brand in the past with the harder sole and it took quite some time to get use to them. I find that before purchasing, it is important to read the description carefully to make sure that I am getting the right kind of sole, ie. (hard sole vs. "Soft bed"). Great quality sandals that can last several years!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Tejera

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit and are comfortable with socks on. I hope the leather softens so that they don’t irritate my skin without socks. I had previously tried on a pair of birkies that looked like these in a store that were even more comfortable and had a softer feel. I ordered these believing they were the same shoe, however, I think these are a lesser quality pair. I’ll keep them because of the fit even if I have to wear socks with them
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Oiled Leather woman's Birkenstock Granada sandals BUT I received the WAXY LEATHER sandals. See Product description - This women's slide sandal features an oiled leather upper that is both durable and comfortable. What I received is Waxy Leather which is Top-grain cowhide, buffed and coated with a waxy finish (very stiff and almost feels like rubber) NOT SOFT AND COMFORTABLE. Disappointed I did not get what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Love the style! Feels good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing one month now and love how aligned my posture is when standing. Only downfall that took away a star is lack of holes. Leather stretched and ran out of holes. Made more, stretched again and had to add more holes, now I can feel it getting loose again. I normally wear a 9.5 bought comparable size and had to mail back for smaller. The smaller one is slightly too long still but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: They don't match
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sandals end of April, due to family illness I only had a chance to do a cursory ck. This morning I found that the sandals don't match in texture (one shoe feels like soft leather, the other hard, thick and firm) or coloring. While I understand they should not be a perfect color match the materials should be.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M.

customer_reviews.title: Underside of buckle cuts into my foot.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a replacement for a VERY old pair of Birkenstock’s that are finally wearing out. They are almost the exact style and are what I was looking for. However, the tabs on the undersides of the buckles dig into my feet - especially on the right shoe. I am still trying to decide whether to return them or try to figure out a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! I have "problem feet" and I can't wear most sandals because they hurt my heel and the ball of my foot. Birkenstock is the only brand I can wear all day. Like some of the other reviews mentioned, these need to be broken in slowly. Also, some of the black color rubbed off on my feet, but that's normal with the type of leather. The soft foot bed is nice... a little softer than my regular pair, but nothing crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The regular width is good for wide feet. The one thing I didn't like was the preformed "natural arch" which hurts my feet. I feel alot of pressure under my foot and its painful. It has no heel support but too much arch support and my feet need heel and foot pad support. The soft sole isn't really that soft either. So comfort wise, it's not so great. Although they are cute and look well made. I think I need to break them in. Definitely not an instant comfort sandal and overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Zllih

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorites! I used to wear my Rainbows everyday, but these have replaced them. I wore them around the house for 2 weeks to break them in, which I definitely recommend doing before you wear them out for a long day. If you don't break them in the top strap might chafe your foot and the sole won't be too comfortable. They're cuter (imo) than the regular Birks and I've gotten away with wearing these out to bars. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style but rough material
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes, but the underside of the upper leather is really rough. I’ve had to wear them with socks hoping eventually the leather will soften, but this is unlike other Birkenstocks I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: V. Dzugan

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, well made Birkenstock sandals. I was very impressed, they are authentic, and made in Germany. They do not stain my feet with dye. After receiving this black pair, I ordered a brown pair which is arriving tomorrow. They help alleviate my foot and knee pain, I can stay on my feet all day with these. Well worth the money! UPDATE: The brown pair I ordered arrived, and they are also perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my birks
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good pair of sandals with no backstrap across my injured heel and remembered years ago when I lived in a pair of Granada birks. Just ordered another pair (I wear an 8.5/9 and have wide feet and the 39 M birk fits perfectly). I could not be happier. I need to use arch supports at the moment, and the 3/4 ones I have work great in these birks. Highly recommend these Granada birks.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock sandals purchased June 2019 already deteriorating.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals in June 2019. They’ve already begun to deteriorate. As you can see the rubber on the front end of the shoe has already come apart on both sandals. I paid $135 for the sandals. Also the leather has stretched so much that the sandals will not stay on my feet and they are on the tightest notch. Very disappointed with Birkenstock.
customer_reviews.author: Diane E

customer_reviews.title: I’m pretty sure these are not authentic
customer_reviews.text: They were too small. The leather is stiff. I ordered a new pair from the Birkenstock’s site. The difference is huge. These are knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon In Yolo

customer_reviews.title: Podiatrist says Birkenstocks are better than orthotics!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had at least 10+pairs of Granada Birks. I only buy Granadas because they are the only feminine looking sandal. My foot dr says Birkenstocks are as good as orthotics. I wear them everyday. I don’t go anywhere bare footed even to the bathroom in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: leather is stiff
customer_reviews.text: After reading review, I ordered an 8 1/2; it fit width wise just fine, even though I usually wear 8 1/2 W. however the leather is so stiff that it rubs the skin. It looks great and I wish the leather were softer, I would have kept them. For that alone, i returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is comfortable and I usually get a full year of constant ...
customer_reviews.text: This brand seems to run large. I usually wear size 8 and used your conversion chart to order size 7 1/2 knowing from previous experience with this brand that they run large. The shoe still is loose on me. Next pair I will order a full size smaller than other shoes I wear. The shoe is comfortable and I usually get a full year of constant use from them. This is my second pair of the same style. I didn't expect them to look like rough leather. I expected the top leather to be smooth. They are acceptable for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations - Finally Found a Pair of Birkenstocks that Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a pair of Birkenstocks for a while. I have a longer second toe, so it's hard to find ones that fit without rubbing that toe across the front of the shoe. These ones fit the bill. I've tried many other styles and these ones are the only style that keep that toe from hitting. I have high arches, so the arch support is great and almost too low, because my arches are so high.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: The straps
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new Birkenstocks. I bought this particular style "Granada" because there wasn't any other style available. They were sold out of the style I have worn for years. The straps on these sandals are very uncomfortable. I don't like the gap between the straps, I will return these today, and go find a store locally that carries the old school Arizona style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worn already  by someone  else
customer_reviews.text: I would return this if I could. Gave them as a gift to my daughter and on closer look somebody had worn this already. Not what I expected when you pay for a new pair. I should have know when she opened the box and there was black polish everywhere. I having been wearing birkenstocks for years and you can tell when someone has worn them. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandals for high arches
customer_reviews.text: I have end stage arthritis in my right foot. This particular Birkenstock is the perfect shoe for my foot. The arch is good if you have a high arch. The foot bed is so nice next to my skin. Finding a black 38 normal is hard, but Amazon to the rescue. The shoes came quicker than expected in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Alice C

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with how quickly they arrived
customer_reviews.text: there where marks on shoe from the box being crushed during shipping. Very happy with how quickly they arrived. Very comfortable. You do have to wear them like an hour or two each day until they are broken in....do not just put them on brand new and go walking on vacation (etc)....you will be sorry. After they are broken in you will just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Catsroses

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: i've worn birkenstocks enough to know that i have to size up. i wear a women's 6 and i buy a 37. i normal don't wear narrow fit shoes but the the narrow fit seems to work best for me just because my feet are a bit more flat. the soft foot bed makes a difference for me because of my flat feet. they take a couple weeks to break in and turned my feet slightly black from the straps but overall still amazing sandals.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLover

customer_reviews.title: another great shoe
customer_reviews.text: someone recommended Birkenstocks to me when I started having Plantar feet. they were right. After resting from my walk routine for awhile, icing, and making sure I keep a shoe like this on all the time, it is improving greatly. I specifically bought the soft foot bed because of my heel problem. I could tell the difference from the regular ones. the arch support is so great that it actually takes the pressure off of my heel. I tried the regular but even with my bunion, I am more comfortable in the narrow. they stay on my feet even though there is no back strap.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are easy to put on, super comfortable after the soft bed conforms to your foot and they are so cute. I like to wear them with skirts, shorts and even pants. I like having black shoes that are stylish but not high heels.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: I do love them but not quite as much as I love ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I wanted black Birkenstocks and they were one of the few pair that didn't have something between my toes and came with the padded footbed (which you pay extra for). I do love them but not quite as much as I love the pair bought 27 years ago! These feel slightly wide for my medium to slightly narrow foot. I know that Birkenstocks need to get broken in before they feel as good as they should so I'll keep wearing them, hoping that one day they feel as comfy as my other pair. I wear a 6.5 shoe size and ordered a 36 which fits as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota CB

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these unless you want a hard footbed and stiff straps.
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be somewhat more comfortable than they are. Even though the description says that they are the "soft" ones the footbed is very hard. The leather straps are also very stiff and uncomfortable. I wanted to return these but when I tried it said that I was beyond the 30 day return window. (By about 10 days) I mistakenly thought Amazon, and Prime in particular had a longer return window. These are so uncomfortable on my foot that I will never wear them and SO a complete waste of about $140! NOT happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Deb G

customer_reviews.title: buckle broke two months in...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Birkenstock wearer since childhood. Every pair I've owned withstood strenuous wear and lasted a couple years, minimum. These are the most expensive Birks I've ever purchased and the tiny rod on the buckle broke off two months after purchase. They are unwearable now, and past the return deadline. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstocks Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Birkenstocks. They provide good support, are cute and comfortable. I tried them on in a store first so I would be sure about the size. I wear a 9 in other shoe brands and a 39 M in Birkenstocks. They are a bit pricey, but my feet's happiness is worth it. I have high arches and need the support which is hard to find in a lot of shoes. I have the Granadas and the Mayaris and love both of them.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenDogLover

customer_reviews.title: I love Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these due to having a pair exactly like them for 8 years. I have wore them so much. I wear them everywhere. I have just about wore out my old pair. These shoes last and last. Love Love Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Hall-Osborne

customer_reviews.title: If you wear medium width, order narrow
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews and seller advice, I ordered this style in a narrow width. I am a 7.5-8 medium and have never been able to tolerate narrow shoes across the front of my foot, but this sandal is actually too wide across the front unless I tighten all the way to the last hole. I also ordered a size smaller than my usualy Euro 38. I wasn't thrilled with the "already tried on and tossed back into the box as is" appearance of them when they arrived, but other than that, they came in fine, new condition.
customer_reviews.author: SLF

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in a ripped box without the hang tags. The footpads did not match between the two shoes, either. I am pretty sure they are fakes, I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable for the money
customer_reviews.text: These sandals fit weird on my feet. They felt like they were crooked on my feet and I was walking on the edge but when I adjusted the straps it didn’t make them better. I returned them due to the price. Not very comfortable for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A really nice looking pair of Birks
customer_reviews.text: I love the soft footbed and so always order those now rather than the regular footbed shoes. I have a LOT of trouble with my feet (old age, bunions, sensitive toes, etc.) and so Birkenstocks are the only shoes I can walk in (5 miles or more) comfortably. Anything else and my feet are screaming in pain. I also hike in them--off the road, up mountains--never knew I would have a son for whom hiking was akin to bowing to Mecca 5 times a day. This particular style is pretty enough that I can also wear them with nice, chiffony pants and even dresses. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet B. Chino

customer_reviews.title: Get narrow if your foot tends in that direction.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Fit as expected for narrow. I chose well since I have a narrow foot and knew I would need to have adjustable straps. After changing the buckles tighter, they fit great. Hoping they won't stretch out any more than they have..... Normally I would buy a regular shoe but I knew Birkenstock ran wide so I bought the narrow. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: I was really hoping to love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love these sandals, but I have to say I just like them. They're fairly comfortable except for the upper straps which rub and would give me blisters on my toes if I wore them for too long. Although the arch support is good, I was expecting a more cushioned footbed, since they are advertized as having a "soft footbed", which they don't, in my opinion. I'm going to keep them, and hope that as I wear them longer, they'll get more comfortable. I think I should learn my lesson though, and realize that it's not a good idea for me to buy footwear that I can't try on before I buy.
customer_reviews.author: NJC

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t be happier!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! I’ve been wanting Birkenstocks for an extremely long time, but whenever I've tried them on at the store they look wide and clunky- not cute. When I saw on Amazon that narrow sizes were offered, I decided to give them another shot in hopes that the problem would be fixed. I couldn’t be happier! They’re extremely comfortable, no break in period, and look awesome!!! I know that $130+ is a lot for some sandals but I’m the type of person that wears the same shoes day after day. They go with everything and I’m confident they’re going to last me a really long time. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Davis

customer_reviews.title: You Don't Have to Be Granola to Wear Birkies
customer_reviews.text: I need to wear Birkenstocks due to a hip condition that impacts my feet, and have been wearing both the Granada and the Papillio styles to uptown Manhattan to visit with my surgeon. The Granada goes well with long or short skirts, black tights, you name it, and they don't appear odd. Even in the "shoe capital of the US" I have received many compliments, and at least three people have flat out told me, "I really need to reconsider Birkenstocks; they look great!". Please note however that the Granada sole feels stiffer than the Papillios, so if you need more sole flexibility I would consider purchasing alternate styles.
customer_reviews.author: shellyc711

customer_reviews.title: Too uncomfortable even for Birkenstocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Foot bed is very uncomfortable, even after one week of wearing them everyday, all day. I've bought several pairs of Birkenstock shoes over the past 20 years, some are originals which I still wear, like the Birkie and the Birkenstock loafer. But these are terrible and I'll probably end up throwing them out. Too bad, I should have stayed with their Aztec model. Thank God for Fitflops, they never fail me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these from amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and don’t buy these sandals on amazon. Within a month the small leather straps started to twist and break. Go to a local place that sells Birkenstock’s. I spent over $100 on these and they are junk.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kline

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock are the very BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Birkenstocks and this pair is really nice looking too! Fit as expected and the leather upper is soft. I would buy this again in a heartbeat, but if they last as long as my last pair (15 years!) I won't have to!
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are very comfortable and prettier/fancier than the standard Birkenstock. I get compliments on them all the time. I wear a size 8 and have a somewhat wide foot...38 NOT NARROW was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Marimonster

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: After having suffered with plantar fasciitis ten years ago, I never go barefoot and always find shoes with good arch supports or add inserts. I have always used Birkenstocks for my warm weather around-the-house shoes. This is my second pair of the Granada model and the first in Narrow, for which I am extremely grateful. I normally wear a 7 1/2 N and the 38 N fits exactly. The only thing I did not care for was the suede foot bed material, which was a bit rough. However it wears off pretty quickly though slightly staining your feet in the process.
customer_reviews.author: VMH

customer_reviews.title: Nice Style
customer_reviews.text: These soft bed sandals are very comfortable and required no breaking in whatsoever. The turquoise is a great color and go well with denim too. The Granadas are more stylish than other Birkenstock sandals. They are definitely helping my plantar fasciitis and other foot ailments.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Soft bed is excellent. Narrow width fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: The soft footbed is definitely worth the extra price. I walk for miles in these shoes. If you have a narrow foot, order the narrow width and one size up. The narrow fit better than my regular width Birkenstock sandals. I did order a size larger in the narrow width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I instinctively splurged on these sandals. They are the most comfortable shoes that I own, although they did take a day to break in. They fit as expected, I have absolutely zero complaints. The soles do get a little dirty but I have found that lightly scrubbing with baking soda and air drying (NOT IN DIRECT SUNLIGHT OR WITH HEAT) cleans them up very nicely. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Dani EscobarTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Cute awesome Birks
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes😍 Birks are so comfy and cute, and I love that I was able to find them for a fair price on amazon. They fit true to size, and though they’re a little worn now because I wore them a ton the first few years, they’re still in pretty great shape.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Birkies
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Birkenstocks. The Granada is a bit dressier than the Arizona. The soft footbed is so comfortable. I can’t wear a regular width so it’s sometime difficult to find a narrow width. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: San W

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out what on earth was wrong with this pair of Birkenstocks. I wore them around the house to try to break them in but they felt short in comparison to others I've ordered. Turns out they were a narrow which is NOT what I ordered, But I must have clicked the wrong button. Needless to say, had worn them around the house a bit too much and my toe prints were on the cork so, I can't return them They'll work as house slippers. WIsh I'd paid attention and gotten my actual size medium width.
customer_reviews.author: L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: These are Birkenstock = good quality and arch support. But even though I expected narrow, these sandals are also shorter than other size 38 sandals purchased in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable foot bed
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable foot bed, straps need a little breaking in...wore socks with them the first few times and that worked fine. Love the comfortable foot bed! Yes, I already said that! Hope they last a long time...love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Birks! I tried some on in the store so I knew I needed to order a size down. I normally wear a size 6 which would be a European 37. I ordered a 36 regular width, they fit perfectly. A 37 would've been too big on my somewhat wide foot. ✌
customer_reviews.author: Paula Wormington

customer_reviews.title: Love Birkenstock’s !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of these Birkenstock’s - they are so comfortable and they last forever. I have some arthritis in my feet and these are the best shoe for daily comfort. Would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stylish Birkenstocks?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Birkenstock soft-bed sandals. I think these are going to take a bit longer to get broken in than my first pair. I'm confident they'll be good, but that's why they get four stars. They're cute for a casual sandal and I'm sure I'll wear them on the days I'm not wearing my old Birkenstocks.
customer_reviews.author: jane lazer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: I have about 37 pairs of Birkenstock shoes. My feet used to hurt years ago, then I bought Birkenstock shoes and have had happy feet ever since. These are just one more great fitting pair!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Classic for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a member of the Birkenstock Brigade since 1990 and every summer, give or take, I buy a new pair. They can't be destroyed--I have resoled, and re-corked but I still wear a pair of Ivy Green Arizonas that are twenty-two years old. That said, these are much prettier and the soft footbed is fantastic. Make sure to get the right width. Open footprint is "medium-wide", filled in footprint in "narrow". I have a wide foot and the 39R is the gold standard for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Would give 4 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great for the price. Leather is not as thick as it used to be. Need to slip them off if I need to crouch down. Afraid they will stretch out too fast if I don't.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. R.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, stiff leather
customer_reviews.text: The footbed is very comfortable and feels form fitting after just a couple of wears. One review said they didn't need any breaking in but I disagree. The leather upper is quite stiff and rubbed my foot, but I am confident it will stretch and soften with more wear. Update: The leather has softened. There is still a little discomfort on got sweaty days but the shoes are comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of Birkenstock. Reading many reviews I thought I would try them. I have had them for about a month now and they still are not as comfortable as I had expected. They were the most expensive sandals I have ever bought. I believe that my Clark sandals are more comfortable. Not what I expected them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Helen A. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal, be sure to order a size down.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my mom, and she loves them. Typical quality and comfort you always expect from a Birkenstock sandal. Very nice looking brown leather color as well. If you have not purchased Birkenstock before, be aware that they run about a full size larger than most sizes. My mom typically wears a size 7, and the 36 narrow fit her perfect. They also run wide, because she does not have especially narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstocks—a costly mistake
customer_reviews.text: I tried breaking these shoes in as directed on line. After two weeks my whole lower body was so out of lignment that I went to my chiropractor who suggested I should never wear them again. They were the most uncomfortable shoes I have ever owned. They did not get better over time and I have spent over a month getting my feet, legs, knees, lower back, and hips to stop hurting. Thanks to weekly visits to my chiropractor I am improving. Money wasted and money spent correcting the problems they caused! I would not recommend them to my worst enemy!
customer_reviews.author: Jane J. Broadrick

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes - Remember to Check Size Chart
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews warn about Birkenstocks running large. Perhaps that applies more to the unisex models as the Women's Granada were true to size for me. I wear a 9.5 and ordered the 40 EU which were recommended from the sizing chart and they fit perfectly. They provide a lot more arch support than any shoe I have ever worn. I also ordered the narrow, after reviewing their website. I am typically a medium (B) in width and according to the Birkenstock website their narrow is the American equivalent of A-B. While their regular is the American equivalent of C-D.
customer_reviews.author: paularev

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite Birkenstocks. I bought a pair in brown at the store and was so excited to see that you have them here on Amazon in black. They're expensive shoes but they're expensive everywhere. Love that they could be delivered to my door. I love this particular style because they are less restrictive because the straps Are much thinner so if you don't like the thick chunk straps of Birkenstocks, Then you'll love these. Also I have bigger feet so I just take them to my local cobbler and add extra holes no problem so it makes them easily adjustable to a bigger size foot.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha B

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I was never a Birkenstock person until I broke my toes, now I can live in them. These were prefect out of the box, received them earlier then excepted. Not a chunky as other birks, which is nice (I think a little more girly)
customer_reviews.author: Bigblu

customer_reviews.title: Defective sole and buckle
customer_reviews.text: Broken buckle right sandal. Not llike new”as stated by amazon warehouse. More like “gently used” which I wouldn’t have paid almost full price for. Even though the soles have no wear there is some compression of the right heel between the cork/rubber sole and visible glue
customer_reviews.author: jlk

customer_reviews.title: Loved them, but..
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, it's cute with jeans and other casual pants. They are very comfortable, the day I got them I wore them shopping all day and didn't get a blister. But.... I also had a problem. The part of the buckle that is on the inside of the left shoe, that goes across the foot, had a very sharp piece of steel that came to a point. I have Neuropathy in my feet and Never felt it rubbing my foot until I got home and took them off.I didn't bleed so I never noticed. I sent them back, but I'm going to reorder them and just check them this time.I did love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Home Run again for Birkenstock!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Birkenstocks all of my life, each pair lasting for years with continuous wear. This particular style is now my favorite, which also seems a more dressy look. The disappointment is that this is not a blue, which I preferred, and it is not a gray, but more of a bluish gray which I actually like very much. The size fits perfectly and the comfort is fabulous! I love that Birkenstock sticks to what has been working for many many years, and continue providing the same excellent quality workmanship, and that I know what I am getting when ordering Birkenstocks.
customer_reviews.author: Charming

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product :)
customer_reviews.text: These sandals have really impressed my wife it is her second pair of Birks and the soft footbed is really the way to go . As a guy I would recommend getting a neutral color or a color that matches a lot of clothes to save on the amount of shoes/sandals around the house . The style of these shoes is a little more expensive but they really are envied by others and she likes them a lot. I am a very frugal man and after finding her a pair at a yardsale and seeing what she has put the other pair through ( rain/snow/ beach/mud/grass ) you name it I figured they were worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin       Va.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Birkenstock sandals for more than 20-years because of heel spurs. The Granada is very stylish and the soft footbed cradles my feet in cloud-like comfort. This particular pair replaces the black Granada soft footbed I purchased in 2013. The 2013 pair will become my around the house sandals and the new pair will be placed in my work rotation of a dozen pair in various styles, colors and prints.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock Women's Granada Soft Footbed Sandal, Habana, 39 N EU
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 4 stars and that's only because of the fit. This is my own fault. I use to wear 7's but in my later years have felt more comfortable in an 8. These were reduced price and in American fit showed I should order a 38. But at the special pricing only was offered a39. Irregardless I bought the 39's. I am very satisfied with these shoes even with being slightly too big. The shoes meet their standard of exceptable quality. they feel really good while wearing them,I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone considering this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first pairs of Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Birkenstocks, and I am 41. I decided to buy a pair when my mother was diagnosed with Plantar Faciitis. I have worn cheap flip flops for years and I was afraid I would be heading for trouble in my later years if I didn't do something different. I was afraid of Birkenstocks because I remember many years back I tried on someone else's pair and didn't like the feel, but I love these. They are comfortable and fit my foot well. They don't feel big and floppy. I am pleased and am glad I ordered one pair for errands and this second pair for a little more dress up.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Grat Birkenstock sandal.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and support but takes a bit of time to break-in which is true for all Birkenstocks. Delivery was rapid.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: New customer to Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: These are my first Birkenstocks. I used to wear crocks. I .ike them but a former foot bed than I'm used to. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Know your size, get fitted if it's your first time wearing Birkenstock.
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! COMFORT~ But....I ended up with a 42 narrow in this shoe as my middle toe hit right on the ridge of the front, I usually wear a 10 in a woman's shoe...but I had ordered a 41 M and it was too short for me as well as too wide...I ended up being fitted for this same style, and I love, love , love the Birkenstock now.Worth the money. I have back issues, and this shoe has helped me with some of that, I will get a pair for our dreaded winters here in MN,in a more weather friendly style. Two days of "break in" and I was ready to go do my shopping and errands. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mn country gal

customer_reviews.title: Love the soft footbed
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Birkenstock sandals for 40 years . Switched over to the Birkis rubber sandals as no maintenance and could wear in all conditions, rain and snow and puddles. Bought a pair of the soft footbed Granada clogs in October and was in heaven. Loved the extra comfort of the soft footbed. Just got these for summer and although I thought they ran slightly larger, once I tightened the strap they were perfect and very comfortable. Much better than the original Birkenstock footbed or the Birkis. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: SW Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not that soft!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's been years since I had a new pair of soft bed Birkies and I was really looking forward to that wonderful soft, suede like feeling to my feet. Well, these are not that soft or soothing as I remember my first pair being. Did I forget or did they change the material! They are still nice looking, comfortable Birkies but not what I had expected, disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on Birk's to fit right and feel good. I wish they had more feminine styles with more decorative laser cuts in the leather. I purchased a white pair years ago, from HSN or QVC. Wish I could find another pair of those because I've worn them to death. Can't wear them for dressier outfits now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the Florida style....
customer_reviews.text: As a long time wearer of Birkenstock sandals, I purchased these when I couldn't find the Florida soft footbed in black that I was looking for. I sent them back because the upper strap was too low on my foot making it difficult to keep on my feet. These may work well for others but not my size 41 narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sandals but had to return as they hurt my feet, I have a morton's neuroma and they just aggravated it more. I would have loved to have kept them though!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Womens Granada Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Per other reviews I ordered one size smaller than I would have. Glad that I did as the smaller size is the right size. I've always wanted to have a pair of Birk's but the price has always stopped me. They apparently have a "break": in faze and I am still in that. I recently suffered from a "unknown cause" of foot pain and my Orthopedic advised me to wear shoes with a good arch, and the Birk's fit that requirement. I prefer leather over suede and these are a little more feminine that some of the other styles. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: My first Birkenstock purchase and LOVE them. I have a narrow foot and suffer from plantar fasciitis and these are perfect. My foot fits snuggly so my feet are not slipping around and the design is flattering...not clunky. No pain when I sm wearing them. Would definitely buy again or on a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? They are Birkenstocks and have become one of my favorite shoe brands. This is my second pair; my first pair is a medium width and they are great; this pair I ordered in a narrow width and the fit is perfect. I highly recommend this sandal...nice color and made for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Richards

customer_reviews.title: The Soft Bed is the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7-7.5 shoe. These were too long . A 6 would have fit, but comfort of Birkenstock can't be beat. There is a believable knock off being sold on line for $59. from China. Didnt realize from China till I received. Gave it away.Not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Birkenstock sandals! Hope they continue to make this particular model as it fits over my bunion perfectly and looks nice :) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CarolMom57

customer_reviews.title: If you have sensitive feet, try these
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Birkenstocks for some time, and though they generally feel good and offer excellent support, the soft footbed makes them even better. When I do a lot of walking, the regular footbed can rub in sensitive areas like the balls of my feet, my arches or under my toes. The extra padding of the soft footbed eliminates these problems, and it's the same price as the regular, so why not give it a try? The only drawback is that the padding makes them a little "warmer" than the regular footbed, so if your feet sweat a lot, you might be better off wearing socks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Never leve home without my Birki's.
customer_reviews.text: Birkenstocks are not just for "hippie-type tree huggers.' I have lived in my Birkenstocks forever - since I was in hig school. They are perfect for my feet, and keep my back from hurting when I walk. I wear them everyday, no matter the weather. I also camp, hike and exercise in them. I have several pair, and use them according to what I'm wearing, or the circumstances I'm entering. You can't beat a pair of Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.author: V. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy sandal out there.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about, these are awesome. My feet are horrible and hurt all the time, but these are so comfy, wish I could afford to have 10 prs!
customer_reviews.author: BoxerMama

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sandals...I ordered Birkenstock sandals on the advice of my chiropractor, who suggested them for support for my arches. I wasn't enthused about the idea, as I didn't care for the looks of the bulky, unattractive sandals I associated with the brand. Happily, I saw these feminine looking sandals on Amazon and immediately placed an order for them. I really like them and they fit as I had expected...they are very comfortable and easy to wear, and stay on my feet unlike many slip-on sandals I've worn in the past. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Alyne

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet are here again :)
customer_reviews.text: My feet hate the winter time--snow boots, and socks, etc. But last week, it got a little warm for about a minute at the same time the IRS sent back my tax refund, so I ordered a new pair of Granada Birks, with the soft footbed, LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the SFB. The Granada is my favorite Birk's style. I think it has the same level of support as the Florida, but I think that the cutwork actually lets my feet breathe a little more, even if it does leave a random tan pattern on my foot when I"m wearing "dressy" sandals. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl McCallister

customer_reviews.title: The 39 has a bit more length than I would like, but they are still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size they suggested from the chart, but they just barely fit in length, so I ordered the next size up. I usually wear an 8, but the 38 was a little too small. The 39 has a bit more length than I would like, but they are still comfortable. I wish they came in half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bradley

product_meta.title: Birkenstock Women's Granada Soft Footbed Leather Narrow Sandal, Black Oiled Leather (40 M EU)
product_meta.description: This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two these are the simple ideas that have made feet happy for over two hundred years, and thats the original Birkenstock. These shoes are made in Germany since 1774. No smoke, no mirrors, and no gizmos are needed. You walk, the shoe molds to your foot. The shape of the Original Birkenstock Footbed enables body weight to be distributed evenly over the whole foot, providing it with optimal support.
feature_bullets: Original BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed; anatomically shaped
Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle
